mapper.select: select m.name as member, s.name as setmeal, DATE_FORMAT(o.orderDate,'%Y-%m-%d') orderDate, o.orderType, o.setmeal_id from t_member as m, t_setmeal as s, t_order as o where o.id=#{orderId} and o.member_id=m.id and o.setmeal_id=s.id
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate=#{value}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate=#{value} and orderStatus='已到诊'
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >=#{value} and orderStatus='已到诊'

select s.name, ot.total setmeal_count, (sc.grouptotal/ot.total) proportion, s.remark from (select setmeal_id ,count(id) grouptotal from t_order GROUP BY setmeal_id) sc, (select count(id) total from t_order) ot , t_setmeal s where s.id=sc.setmeal_id order by ot.total desc limit 0,4
